qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the ages of patients A. Smith and T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith is 12 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is 95 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what are the diagnosis results of A. Smith and T. Jackson?

content: Consultation Records: Consultation with psychiatry confirmed diagnosis and recommended combined pharmacotherapy and psychotherapy.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, A. Smith was diagnosed with Acute Schistosomiasis; according to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, T. Jackson was diagnosed with Major Depressive Disorder.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, what is the ethnicity of patients A. Smith and T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of both Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, both patients A. Smith and T. Jackson are of Caucasian ethnicity.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, A. Smith or T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Smith was admitted on October 9, and T. Jackson was admitted on July 11. T. Jackson was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, whose body temperature was higher upon admission, A. Smith or T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Smith's body temperature was 39°C upon admission, while T. Jackson's body temperature was 98.4°F (approximately 36.9°C). A. Smith's body temperature was higher.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital and Greenfield General Hospital, whose pulse rate was higher upon admission, A. Smith or T. Jackson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Smith's pulse rate was 110 bpm upon admission, while T. Jackson's pulse rate was 70 bpm. A. Smith's pulse rate was higher.
